mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.post_id AS postId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content AS content, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.updated_at AS updatedAt, u.nickname AS nickname FROM board_comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.comment_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comments (post_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.post_id AS postId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content AS content, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.updated_at AS updatedAt, u.nickname AS nickname, p.title AS postTitle FROM board_comments c INNER JOIN board_post p ON c.post_id = p.post_id LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC, c.comment_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}
